comments.body: I attached a patch to fix this bug.

Even the solution provided by sanjivsingh is not optimal , the node should be deleted in sequence that is the lowest one should be deleted first , as it is  following queue property , i have made the optimal and accurate solution for this and would like to attach the solution.
